revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Darwin|darwin}} '''Darwin''' most often refers to: <!-- THESE ARE THE MOST COMMON ONES LIKELY TO BE SEARCHED FOR OR LINKED TO AS "DARWIN" ONLY: (sorted by most likely) --> * [[Charles Darwin]] (1809–1882), English naturalist and writer, best known as the originator of the theory of biological evolution by natural selection * [[Charles Galton Darwin]] (1887–1962), English physicist, grandson of Charles Darwin * [[Darwin, Northern Territory]], a capital city in Australia * [[Darwin (surname)]], a surname (including a list of people with the name)
'''Darwin''' may also refer to:
{{TOC right}}
==Computing== * [[Darwin (operating system)]], the Unix base for Apple's iOS and macOS operating systems * [[Darwin (programming game)]] * [[Darwin (programming language)]] * [[Darwin (ADL)]], an architecture description language * [[Darwin Information Typing Architecture]] * [[Darwin Streaming Server]] * [[XDarwin]]
==Entertainment== * [[Darwin (1920 film)|''Darwin'' (1920 film)]], a 1920 German silent film * [[Darwin (2011 film)|''Darwin'' (2011 film)]], a 2011 documentary film * [[Darwin (2015 film)|''Darwin'' (2015 film)]], a 2015 science fiction film by Alain Desrochers * ''[[Darwin's Nightmare]]'', a 2004 documentary film * [[Darwin (1991 biography)]] * [[Darwin (Marvel Comics)]], a fictional character in the Marvel Comics Universe, associated with X-Men * [[Darwin (seaQuest DSV)|Darwin (''seaQuest DSV'')]], a dolphin in the TV series ''seaQuest DSV'' * ''[[Darwin 4078]]'', an arcade game * ''[[Darwin!]]'', a 1972 album by Banco del Mutuo Soccorso *[[Darwin Watterson]], a fictional character in The Amazing World of Gumball
==Places== ===Australia=== ====Northern Territory==== * [[City of Darwin]] * [[Darwin, Northern Territory]] * [[Darwin International Airport]] * [[Darwin Coastal]] * [[Darwin River, Northern Territory]] * [[Division of Darwin]], 1903–1955 election division
====Tasmania==== * [[Darwin, Tasmania]] * [[Darwin Crater]] * [[Darwin Dam]]
===Chile=== * [[Darwin Channel]], Chile * [[Darwin Sound]], Chile * [[Cordillera Darwin]], Tierra del Fuego, Chile
===United Kingdom=== * [[Darwin College, Cambridge]] * [[Darwin College, Kent]] * [[Darwin Shopping Centre]], Shrewsbury * [[Darwin (ward)]], an electoral ward in Greater London, in the London Borough of Bromley * The Darwin Centre, of the [[Natural History Museum, London#The Darwin Centre|Natural History Museum]], London
===United States=== * [[Darwin, California]] * [[Darwin, Fresno County, California]] * [[Darwin Falls]], a waterfall in California * [[Darwin Falls Wilderness]], California * [[Darwin, Illinois]] * [[Darwin Township, Clark County, Illinois]] * [[Darwin, Minnesota]] * [[Darwin, Ohio]] * [[Darwin, Oklahoma]] * [[Darwin, Texas]] * [[Darwin, Virginia]]
===Other places=== * [[Darwin, Falkland Islands]] * [[Darwin Island]], Galapagos Islands * [[Darwin (lunar crater)]], a crater on the Moon * [[Darwin (Martian crater)]], a crater on Mars * [[Darwin, Río Negro]], a municipality in Río Negro Province, Argentina * [[Darwin Bank]], an oil field in Azerbaijan * [[Darwin Glacier (Antarctica)]] * [[Darwin Mountains]], Antarctica
==Science== * [[1991 Darwin]], a main-belt asteroid * [[Darwin (unit)]], a unit of evolutionary change, defined by J.B.S. Haldane * [[Darwin (spacecraft)]], a European Space Agency project * [[Darwin Lagrangian]], a concept in physics * [[Darwin Medal]] * [[RRS Charles Darwin|RRS ''Charles Darwin'']], a 1984 British ship * [[Cordillera Darwin Metamorphic Complex]], a geological unit in Tierra del Fuego
==Other uses== * [[Darwin Airline]], in Switzerland * [[Darwin Baseball League]], North Australian sport * [[Darwin Rugby League]], North Australian sport * [[Darwin rebellion]], a demonstration which took place in Australia in 1918
==See also== * [[Darwin Awards]] * [[Darwin glass]] * [[Charles Darwin (disambiguation)]] * [[Charles Waring Darwin (disambiguation)]] * [[List of things named after Charles Darwin]] * [[Mount Darwin (disambiguation)]] * [[Port Darwin (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
